content:
In #9695 I have refactored the definition docs#Submodule.completeLattice so that it has better definitional properties.

I actually just needed the missing lemma Submodule.toAddSubmonoid_sSup which is added as part of this PR but I decided I might as well be a good citizen and arrange for this to be true by definition.

Unfortunately a small number of proofs needed heartbeat bumps as a result of the new (better!) definition. I will look into this again myself when I have more time but I thought I'd canvass for help here if any performance gurus feel like pitching in.
